rules.natural: If the bank uses a credit scoring system, then the bank has access to customer data.
Whenever the bank serves retail customers, the bank meets regulatory requirements.
Under the condition that the bank provides business loans, the bank offers a mortgage product.
If the bank secures asset backing, then the bank needs collateral.
Either the bank expands its market share or the bank maintains existing clients.

If the bank attracts new customers, then the bank achieves its profitability target.

If the bank operates physical branches, then the bank meets regulatory requirements.
Either the bank reduces its branch network or the bank keeps a full branch network.
